greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of e.g.f. cosh(log(1+tan(x))).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..250
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 + (1 + Tan[x])^2)/(2*(1 + Tan[x])), {x, 0, 20}], x] * Range[0, 20]! (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 22 2015 *)
program: (MAGMA) m:=30; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Rationals(), m); b:=Coefficients(R!(Cosh(Log(1+Tan(x))))); [Factorial(n-1)*b[n]: n in [1..m]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 28 2018
results.author: _R. H. Hardin_
ext: Extended with signs by _Olivier Gérard_, Mar 15 1997
